Class NeonHostJNI

java.lang.Object
com.quietterminal.projectneon.jni.NeonHostJNI
public class NeonHostJNI extends Object
JNI wrapper for NeonHost to enable C/C++ integration.

  • Method Details

    • neonHostNew

      public static long neonHostNew(int sessionId, String relayAddr)
      Creates a new NeonHost instance.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - Session ID for the host
      relayAddr - Relay address (host:port)
      Returns:
      Pointer to NeonHost (as long) or 0 on error

    • neonHostStart

      public static boolean neonHostStart(long hostPtr)
      Starts the host (non-blocking in JNI - should be called from a thread).
      Parameters:
      hostPtr - Pointer to NeonHost
      Returns:
      true if started successfully, false otherwise

    • neonHostProcessPackets

      public static int neonHostProcessPackets(long hostPtr)
      Processes incoming packets (for manual processing instead of start()).
      Parameters:
      hostPtr - Pointer to NeonHost
      Returns:
      Number of packets processed, or -1 on error

    • neonHostGetSessionId

      public static int neonHostGetSessionId(long hostPtr)
      Gets the session ID.
      Parameters:
      hostPtr - Pointer to NeonHost
      Returns:
      Session ID

    • neonHostGetClientCount

      public static int neonHostGetClientCount(long hostPtr)
      Gets the number of connected clients.
      Parameters:
      hostPtr - Pointer to NeonHost
      Returns:
      Client count

    • neonHostSetClientConnectCallback

      public static void neonHostSetClientConnectCallback(long hostPtr, long callback)
      Sets the client connect callback.
      Parameters:
      hostPtr - Pointer to NeonHost
      callback - C function pointer (address as long)

    • neonHostSetClientDenyCallback

      public static void neonHostSetClientDenyCallback(long hostPtr, long callback)
      Sets the client deny callback.
      Parameters:
      hostPtr - Pointer to NeonHost
      callback - C function pointer (address as long)
